item.title: Social Media Hiatus: Regularly Purging My Life Of Unnecessary Distractions
item.description: In recent years, taking a social media hiatus has become an increasingly popular trend. As life becomes more chaotic with the rise of technology, people are looking for ways to disconnect from the world and escape from digital noise. This is especially true for those who feel overwhelmed by their online presence or are looking to reduce distractions in their everyday lives.
